smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (it.exception as ResolvableApiException) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.exception as ResolvableApiException
Parentheses in (parent.width - parent.paddingRight) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: parent.width - parent.paddingRight
Parentheses in (isDirectMessage && settings.useRealName()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: isDirectMessage && settings.useRealName()
Parentheses in (state !is State.Disconnected) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: state !is State.Disconnected

Parentheses in (text_name.toString() != currentName ||
                    text_username.toString() != currentUsername ||
                    text_email.toString() != currentEmail) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: text_name.toString() != currentName ||
                    text_username.toString() != currentUsername ||
                    text_email.toString() != currentEmail
Parentheses in (matchedIndex < 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: matchedIndex < 0
Parentheses in (data.hasAuthorLink && data.hasAuthorName) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: data.hasAuthorLink && data.hasAuthorName
Parentheses in (!data.hasFile && data.hasTitleLink) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !data.hasFile && data.hasTitleLink
Parentheses in (!data.hasMedia && !data.hasMessage && data.hasText) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !data.hasMedia && !data.hasMessage && data.hasText

Parentheses in (
                        text_name.isNotBlank() &&
